docs.snippet: Here are some previous World Cup shock results following Germany's 7-1 demolition of hosts Brazil in the semi-final on Tuesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Here are some previous World Cup shock results following Germany's 7-1 demolition of hosts Brazil in the semi-final on Tuesday.

docs.snippet: The nation whose attacking soccer has thrilled the world for generations was left heart-broken on Tuesday after Brazil's humiliating 7-1 loss to Germany in the World Cup semi-finals.
docs.lead_paragraph: The nation whose attacking soccer has thrilled the world for generations was left heart-broken on Tuesday after Brazil's humiliating 7-1 loss to Germany in the World Cup semi-finals.

docs.snippet: Even for an 84-year-old tournament drenched in history, Germany 7, Brazil 1 — you read that right — will be remembered as one of the craziest World Cup matches ever. Because of the humiliation it inflicted on a great footballing nation,...
docs.lead_paragraph: Even for an 84-year-old tournament drenched in history, Germany 7, Brazil 1 — you read that right — will be remembered as one of the craziest World Cup matches ever. Because of the humiliation it inflicted on a great footballing nation, as one of the most painful to watch, too.

headline.main: Column: Disaster's Branding Iron Burns Brazil Anew
headline.print_headline: Column: Disaster's Branding Iron Burns Brazil Anew

docs.snippet: Few would have envisioned the home team, so close to glory, being so thoroughly overmatched as in the 7-1 semifinal loss to Germany.
docs.lead_paragraph: Few would have envisioned the home team, so close to glory, being so thoroughly overmatched as in the 7-1 semifinal loss to Germany.
docs.abstract: World Cup host Brazil loses semifinal match to Germany, 7-1; regarded as soccer's superpower, Brazil is throttled by German team in game called a soccer massacre; at very least, game will go down as Brazil's worst loss, first in a competitive home game since 1975.

headline.seo: World Cup 2014: Host Brazil Stunned by Germany in Semifinal
headline.main: Goal, Goal, Goal, Goal, Goal, Goal, Goal, and Brazil’s Day Goes Dark
headline.print_headline: Goal, Goal, Goal, Goal, Goal, Goal, Goal: A Dark Day for Brazil

docs.snippet: When Brazil lost to Germany, 7-1, on Tuesday, it lost something much larger than a game in a country where pride over five previous World Cup championships is forged into the national identity.
docs.lead_paragraph: When Brazil lost to Germany, 7-1, on Tuesday, it lost something much larger than a game in a country where pride over five previous World Cup championships is forged into the national identity.
docs.abstract: Across Brazil, where pride over five World Cup championships is forged into national identity, people are struggling to make sense of country's stunning 7-1 loss to Germany and are searching for a way to move on.

headline.seo: In Brazil, World Cup Loss to Germany Looms Large
headline.main: Stunned Brazilians Try to Move On After Their Exalted Team Falls
headline.print_headline: Stunned Brazilians Try to Move On After Their Exalted Team Falls

byline.contributor: Simon Romero reported from Rio de Janeiro, and Seth Kugel from São Paulo, Brazil. Mariana Simões contributed reporting from Rio de Janeiro, and Paula Ramon from São Paulo.
byline.original: By SIMON ROMERO and SETH KUGEL

docs.snippet: It wasn't just a bad dream.
docs.lead_paragraph: It wasn't just a bad dream.

headline.main: Brazil's World Cup Dream Turns to Nightmare
headline.print_headline: Brazil's World Cup Dream Turns to Nightmare

docs.snippet: Brazilians are having a difficult time trying to fathom how it all went wrong so quickly against Germany in the World Cup semifinals.
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazilians are having a difficult time trying to fathom how it all went wrong so quickly against Germany in the World Cup semifinals.

headline.main: Brazilians Struggling to Explain Loss to Germany
headline.print_headline: Brazilians Struggling to Explain Loss to Germany

docs.snippet: Divided by a scoreline as wide as the Atlantic, Germans and Brazilians united after the World Cup hosts' 7-1 humiliation in writing the game into the history of both nations, well beyond the realm of football.
docs.lead_paragraph: Divided by a scoreline as wide as the Atlantic, Germans and Brazilians united after the World Cup hosts' 7-1 humiliation in writing the game into the history of both nations, well beyond the realm of football.

headline.main: In Disbelief, Germans, Brazilians See History Made
headline.print_headline: In Disbelief, Germans, Brazilians See History Made

docs.snippet: Argentine qualifier Renzo Olivo, ranked 282, ousted second seed Tommy Robredo of Spain 7-6 (6), 6-3 to reach the Swedish Open quarterfinals on Wednesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Argentine qualifier Renzo Olivo, ranked 282, ousted second seed Tommy Robredo of Spain 7-6 (6), 6-3 to reach the Swedish Open quarterfinals on Wednesday.

headline.main: Olivo Stuns Robredo to Reach Bastad Quarters
headline.print_headline: Olivo Stuns Robredo to Reach Bastad Quarters

docs.snippet: Brazil coach Luiz Felipe Scolari and his players are trying to put the devastating semifinal loss to Germany behind them as quickly as possible, turning their focus to the farewell match at their home World Cup.
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil coach Luiz Felipe Scolari and his players are trying to put the devastating semifinal loss to Germany behind them as quickly as possible, turning their focus to the farewell match at their home World Cup.

headline.main: Brazil Trying to Shift Focus to 3rd-Place Match
